name: Kill the Superweapon Demo
description:
NOTE: This is an early demo for Kill the Superweapon.  Because it is an early build, there are likely to be bugs and issues, and this is not representative of the final game.

Samantha Kill is waging a one-woman war against weapons manufacturer Abaddon Inc.

Abaddon Inc. have created a series of living Superweapons – People who have been mechanically and genetically altered to be the ultimate killing machines – and plan to start World War III, while supplying their Superweapons to all sides.

Samantha Kill has arrived at the laboratory where Abbadon Inc. is developing Varanus the Lizard Man. She carries with her the Total Ablation Beam: A weapon developed by Abbadon Inc. and the only thing that can harm the Superweapon. She'll have to find the special batteries that charge the beam before she can Kill the Superweapon.

But be warned... Varanus the Lizard Man does not take kindly to intruders

The game is viewed entirely from a diorama-style perspective, allowing for twin-stick shooting as well as jumping in a 3D space.  Once the boss monster is released from his tube, he will be able to roam the level freely.

Controls:

WASD - Move
Arrow Keys - Shoot
Space - Jump
Esc - Pause
M - Mute
